recommendations.summary: The system shows no current security issues or compliance flags, but proactive measures are recommended for data quality and cost optimization.

recommendations.title: Establish GDPR/CCPA Compliance Framework
recommendations.description: Although no compliance flags are detected, it's essential to proactively establish a compliance framework to ensure adherence to GDPR and CCPA regulations.
action_items: Conduct a data inventory to identify personal data processing activities.
Implement a data protection impact assessment (DPIA) process.

recommendations.title: Regular Security Audits
recommendations.description: While no security issues are detected, regular audits can help identify potential vulnerabilities before they become issues.
action_items: Schedule quarterly security audits and penetration testing.
Review and update security policies based on audit findings.

recommendations.title: Implement Cost Monitoring Tools
recommendations.description: To optimize costs, implement monitoring tools to analyze job costs and identify trends for better resource allocation.
action_items: Integrate cost monitoring tools into the platform.
Analyze the last 100 job costs to identify high-expense areas.

recommendations.title: Enhance Data Quality Governance
recommendations.description: With no data quality metrics reported, establishing a data quality governance framework is crucial to ensure data integrity and reliability.
action_items: Define data quality metrics and KPIs.
Implement regular data quality assessments and cleansing processes.

recommendations.title: Define and Monitor SLOs
recommendations.description: The absence of SLO status indicates a need to define and monitor Service Level Objectives to ensure operational excellence.
action_items: Establish clear SLOs for key services.
Implement monitoring tools to track SLO adherence.
